item.title: Error... need help
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

Hey thank you I made it work MY FIRST SCRIPT!!!
[scar]program update;

const
message1=‘Look at the debug window’;
message2=‘Well this is my first scar script’;
message3=‘I hope to be coming out with a power chopper very soon’;

procedure killthecat;
begin
wait(2000)
Writeln(message1);
Writeln(message2);
Writeln(message3);
end;
begin
repeat
killthecat;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Error... need help

item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

ok i followed a tutorial and added some stuff now its not working/not doing what i want it to do.
here it is
[scar]program Script;

const
message1=‘Look at the debug window’;
message2=‘Well this is my first scar script’;
message3=‘I hope to be coming out with a power chopper very soon’;

procedure killthecat;
begin
wait(0005)
Writeln(message1);
end;
begin
repeat
killthecat;
until(true)
end;
procedure seeya;
begin
wait(5200)
Writeln(message2);
repeat
seeya;
until(true)
end.[/scar]
I need help!!!
